project_plan.name: Temperature Conversion CLI Tool
project_plan.description: Develop a command-line Python tool that allows users to convert temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.

task.name: Implement temperature conversion feature from Celsius to Fahrenheit
Implement temperature conversion feature from Celsius to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion feature from Fahrenheit to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion feature from Fahrenheit to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion feature from Kelvin to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion feature from Kelvin to Fahrenheit
Write tests for each of the conversion features above
Execute tests on all implemented conversion features to ensure that they function correctly
